headlines.description: — Will Cuylle and Vincent Trocheck each had two goals, and the New York Rangers beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 7-3 on Wednesday night for their second straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cuylle, Trocheck score two each as Rangers beat Lightning 7-3

video.headline: New York Rangers vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights

highlights.headline: Edmonton Oilers vs. Philadelphia Flyers: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Edmonton Oilers vs. Philadelphia Flyers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Edmonton Oilers vs. Philadelphia Flyers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/13 ESHEET

headlines.description: - Edmonton's Jack Roslovic took advantage of a turnover by Cam York and scored off a 2-on-none break 1:19 into overtime, giving the Oilers a 2-1 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roslovic scores in OT as Oilers defeat Flyers 2-1

video.headline: Edmonton Oilers vs. Philadelphia Flyers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Edmonton Oilers vs. Philadelphia Flyers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/13 ESHEET

headlines.description: — J.J. Peterka and Lawson Crouse scored early in Utah's four-goal third period, and the Mammoth rallied from two goals down to beat the Buffalo Sabres 5-2 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Peterka, Crouse score early in Mammoth's 4-goal 3rd period to beat Sabres 5-2
